alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 1:44PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of Vilas and western Oneida Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and isolated thunderstorm from near Lac Du Flambeau to Mercer to Park Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. Additional showers and isolated thunderstorms are expected to develop across the area during the afternoon. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manitowish Waters around 150 PM CDT. Arbor Vitae around 200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mc Naughton, Sayner, Lower Tomahawk River Natural Area, Nixon Lake Natural Area, Harshaw, Hazelhurst, Woodruff, St Germain, Tomahawk River Pines Natural Area and High Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
